scripts.check:lua: command -v lua >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Lua not installed. Install Lua 5.3 first.' && exit 1)
scripts.publish: npm run build && smartthings edge:channels:assign $(npm run --silent driver:id) --channel 912e7705-ec88-413c-a3ac-1c5ecd9015ba
scripts.deploy: npm run publish && npm run link
scripts.test:on: npm run check:lua && lua test.lua on $IP
scripts.test:off: npm run check:lua && lua test.lua off $IP
scripts.test:get: npm run check:lua && lua test.lua get $IP
